name: MeAndETV and the Mafia: The Greg Update
name_original: MeAndETV and the Mafia: The Greg Update
description:
MeAndETV and the Mafia: The Greg Update is a game developed by BlueSeven98. It was originally released in 2022.
MeAndETV and the Mafia: The Greg Update is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
